Symbol.Script_3D:
! Water Source Heat Pump
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
IF useSysMat THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
unID = 1 IF mbShow THEN
! --- HOTSPOTS --- !
HOTSPOT A/2, B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, -B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, -B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, B/2, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, B/2, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, -B/2, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, -B/2, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1
! --- MAIN BOX --- !
ADD -A/2, -B/2, 0 BLOCK A, B, ZZYZX DEL 1 ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 16, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 16, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 16, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 16, ConPosX_5=ConPosX_5, ConPosY_5=ConPosY_5, ConPosZ_5=ConPosZ_5, ConLength_5=ConLength_5, ConEdit_5 = 16 END
Symbol.Script_2D:
! Water Source Heat Pump
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
unID = 1 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 THEN ! Top
! --- MAIN BOX --- !
HOTSPOT2 A/2, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, -B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, -B/2, unID: unID=unID+1
PUT A/2, B/2, 1, -A/2, B/2, 1, -A/2, -B/2, 1, A/2, -B/2, 1
POLY2_B NSP/3, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen,
GET (NSP)
SET FILL gs_fill_type
PEN gs_cont_pen IF gs_fill_pen THEN PEN gs_fill_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 3+32, 4, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1, mbShow = 0 PEN gs_cont_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1, mbShow = 0 ENDIF
! --- OTHER VIEWS --- !
ROT2 -SYMB_ROTANGLE * (DrawingNum > 1 AND NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED))+SYMB_ROTANGLE * (DrawingNum > 1 AND SYMB_MIRRORED)
IF DrawingNum = 2 THEN PROJECT2 -3, 90, 2 ! Bottom IF DrawingNum = 3 THEN PROJECT2 4, 270, 2 ! Front IF DrawingNum = 4 THEN PROJECT2 4, 90, 2 ! Back IF DrawingNum = 5 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180*(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Right IF DrawingNum = 6 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180*NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Left
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConShow_1 = 0, ConEdit_1 = 12, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConShow_2 = 0, ConEdit_2 = 12, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConShow_3 = 0, ConEdit_3 = 12, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConShow_4 = 0, ConEdit_4 = 12, ConPosX_5=ConPosX_5, ConPosY_5=ConPosY_5, ConLength_5=ConLength_5, ConShow_5 = 0, ConEdit_5 = 12 DEL 1
END
Symbol.Script_1D:
! Water Source Heat Pump
EPS = 0.0001
z = 0
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! Water Source Heat Pump
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_attr[4][4] FOR i = 1 TO 4 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 2 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[5] ui_con_type[1] = 0 ui_con_type[2] = 0 ui_con_type[3] = 0 ui_con_type[4] = 0 ui_con_type[5] = 0
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Water Source Heat Pump
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF A < 0.40 THEN A = 0.40 VALUES "A" RANGE [0.40, ] IF B < 0.20 THEN B = 0.20 VALUES "B" RANGE [0.20, ] IF ZZYZX < 0.20 THEN ZZYZX = 0.20 VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [0.20,] ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 5
! --- 1st CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Соединение Воздуховода #1`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = -1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 1 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 0 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF ConWidth_1 > A-ConWallThickness_1*2-0.05 THEN ConWidth_1 = A-ConWallThickness_1*2-0.05 VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0, A-ConWallThickness_1*2-0.05] IF ConDepth_1 > ZZYZX-ConWallThickness_1*2-0.05 THEN ConDepth_1 = ZZYZX-ConWallThickness_1*2-0.05 VALUES "ConDepth_1" RANGE (0, ZZYZX-ConWallThickness_1*2-0.05] VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0, ]
IF ConPosX_1 < -A/2+0.025+ConWidth_1/2+ConWallThickness_1 THEN ConPosX_1 = -A/2+0.025+ConWidth_1/2+ConWallThickness_1 IF ConPosX_1 > A/2-0.025-ConWidth_1/2-ConWallThickness_1 THEN ConPosX_1 = A/2-0.025-ConWidth_1/2-ConWallThickness_1 VALUES "ConPosX_1" RANGE [-A/2+0.025+ConWidth_1/2+ConWallThickness_1, A/2-0.025-ConWidth_1/2-ConWallThickness_1] PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = -B/2 IF ConPosZ_1 < 0.025+ConDepth_1/2+ConWallThickness_1 THEN ConPosZ_1 = 0.025+ConDepth_1/2+ConWallThickness_1 IF ConPosZ_1 > ZZYZX-0.025-ConDepth_1/2-ConWallThickness_1 THEN ConPosZ_1 = ZZYZX-0.025-ConDepth_1/2-ConWallThickness_1 VALUES "ConPosZ_1" RANGE [0.025+ConDepth_1/2+ConWallThickness_1, ZZYZX-0.025-ConDepth_1/2-ConWallThickness_1] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Соединение Воздуховода #2`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF ConWidth_2 > A-ConWallThickness_2*2-0.05 THEN ConWidth_2 = A-ConWallThickness_2*2-0.05 VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE (0, A-ConWallThickness_2*2-0.05] IF ConDepth_2 > ZZYZX-ConWallThickness_2*2-0.05 THEN ConDepth_2 = ZZYZX-ConWallThickness_2*2-0.05 VALUES "ConDepth_2" RANGE (0, ZZYZX-ConWallThickness_2*2-0.05] VALUES "ConLength_2" RANGE [0, ]
IF ConPosX_2 < -A/2+0.025+ConWidth_2/2+ConWallThickness_2 THEN ConPosX_2 = -A/2+0.025+ConWidth_2/2+ConWallThickness_2 IF ConPosX_2 > A/2-0.025-ConWidth_2/2-ConWallThickness_2 THEN ConPosX_2 = A/2-0.025-ConWidth_2/2-ConWallThickness_2 VALUES "ConPosX_2" RANGE [-A/2+0.025+ConWidth_2/2+ConWallThickness_2, A/2-0.025-ConWidth_2/2-ConWallThickness_2] PARAMETERS ConPosY_2 = B/2 IF ConPosZ_2 < 0.025+ConDepth_2/2+ConWallThickness_2 THEN ConPosZ_2 = 0.025+ConDepth_2/2+ConWallThickness_2 IF ConPosZ_2 > ZZYZX-0.025-ConDepth_2/2-ConWallThickness_2 THEN ConPosZ_2 = ZZYZX-0.025-ConDepth_2/2-ConWallThickness_2 VALUES "ConPosZ_2" RANGE [0.025+ConDepth_2/2+ConWallThickness_2, ZZYZX-0.025-ConDepth_2/2-ConWallThickness_2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 3rd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 3 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #1`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = -1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE (0, MIN(A/2, ZZYZX/2)] PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConWidth_3 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_3" VALUES "ConLength_3" RANGE [0, ]
IF ConPosX_3 < -A/2+0.025+ConWidth_3/2 THEN ConPosX_3 = -A/2+0.025+ConWidth_3/2 IF ConPosX_3 > A/2-0.025-ConWidth_3/2 THEN ConPosX_3 = A/2-0.025-ConWidth_3/2 VALUES "ConPosX_3" RANGE [-A/2+0.025+ConWidth_3/2, A/2-0.025-ConWidth_3/2] PARAMETERS ConPosY_3 = -B/2 IF ConPosZ_3 < 0.025+ConWidth_3/2 THEN ConPosZ_3 = 0.025+ConWidth_3/2 IF ConPosZ_3 > ZZYZX-0.025-ConWidth_3/2 THEN ConPosZ_3 = ZZYZX-0.025-ConWidth_3/2 VALUES "ConPosZ_3" RANGE [0.025+ConWidth_3/2, ZZYZX-0.025-ConWidth_3/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_3, ConPosY = ConPosY_3, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_3, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_3, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_3, ConWidth = ConWidth_3, ConDepth = ConDepth_3, ConLength = ConLength_3, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_3, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_3, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_3, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_3, ConToolType = ConToolType_3, ConStatus = ConStatus_3, ConType_3 = ConType_3, ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3, ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_3, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 4th CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 4 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #2`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = -1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN VALUES "ConWidth_4" RANGE (0, MIN(A/2, ZZYZX/2)] PARAMETERS ConDepth_4 = ConWidth_4 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_4" VALUES "ConLength_4" RANGE [0, ]
IF ConPosX_4 < -A/2+0.025+ConWidth_4/2 THEN ConPosX_4 = -A/2+0.025+ConWidth_4/2 IF ConPosX_4 > A/2-0.025-ConWidth_4/2 THEN ConPosX_4 = A/2-0.025-ConWidth_4/2 VALUES "ConPosX_4" RANGE [-A/2+0.025+ConWidth_4/2, A/2-0.025-ConWidth_4/2] PARAMETERS ConPosY_4 = -B/2 IF ConPosZ_4 < 0.025+ConWidth_4/2 THEN ConPosZ_4 = 0.025+ConWidth_4/2 IF ConPosZ_4 > ZZYZX-0.025-ConWidth_4/2 THEN ConPosZ_4 = ZZYZX-0.025-ConWidth_4/2 VALUES "ConPosZ_4" RANGE [0.025+ConWidth_4/2, ZZYZX-0.025-ConWidth_4/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_4, ConPosY = ConPosY_4, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_4, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_4, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_4, ConWidth = ConWidth_4, ConDepth = ConDepth_4, ConLength = ConLength_4, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_4, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_4, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_4, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_4, ConToolType = ConToolType_4, ConStatus = ConStatus_4, ConType_4 = ConType_4, ConConnectorType_4 = ConConnectorType_4, ConSystem_4 = ConSystem_4, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_4, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 5th CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 5 ConName = `Соединение Трубы #3`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = -1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN VALUES "ConWidth_5" RANGE (0, MIN(A/2, ZZYZX/2)] PARAMETERS ConDepth_5 = ConWidth_5 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_5" VALUES "ConLength_5" RANGE [0, ]
IF ConPosX_5 < -A/2+0.025+ConWidth_5/2 THEN ConPosX_5 = -A/2+0.025+ConWidth_5/2 IF ConPosX_5 > A/2-0.025-ConWidth_5/2 THEN ConPosX_5 = A/2-0.025-ConWidth_5/2 VALUES "ConPosX_5" RANGE [-A/2+0.025+ConWidth_5/2, A/2-0.025-ConWidth_5/2] PARAMETERS ConPosY_5 = -B/2 IF ConPosZ_5 < 0.025+ConWidth_5/2 THEN ConPosZ_5 = 0.025+ConWidth_5/2 IF ConPosZ_5 > ZZYZX-0.025-ConWidth_5/2 THEN ConPosZ_5 = ZZYZX-0.025-ConWidth_5/2 VALUES "ConPosZ_5" RANGE [0.025+ConWidth_5/2, ZZYZX-0.025-ConWidth_5/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_5, ConPosY = ConPosY_5, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_5, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_5, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_5, ConWidth = ConWidth_5, ConDepth = ConDepth_5, ConLength = ConLength_5, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_5, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_5, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_5, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_5, ConToolType = ConToolType_5, ConStatus = ConStatus_5, ConType_5 = ConType_5, ConConnectorType_5 = ConConnectorType_5, ConSystem_5 = ConSystem_5, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_5, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
values "FM_HeatOutput_unit" `З`, `БТЕ/час` values "FM_RefrigeratingOutput_unit" `З`, `БТЕ/час`
if FM_HeatOutput_unit = `БТЕ/час` then hideparameter "FM_HeatOutput" else hideparameter "FM_HeatOutput_btu" endif
if FM_RefrigeratingOutput_unit = `БТЕ/час` then hideparameter "FM_RefrigeratingOutput" else hideparameter "FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu" endif
!1000 W = 3414,426 Btu/hour if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "FM_HeatOutput_btu" then FM_HeatOutput = FM_HeatOutput_btu / 3.414426 parameters FM_HeatOutput = FM_HeatOutput else FM_HeatOutput_btu = FM_HeatOutput * 3.414426 parameters FM_HeatOutput_btu = FM_HeatOutput_btu endif
!1000 W = 3414,426 Btu/hour if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu" then FM_RefrigeratingOutput = FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu / 3.414426 parameters FM_RefrigeratingOutput = FM_RefrigeratingOutput else FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu = FM_RefrigeratingOutput * 3.414426 parameters FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu = FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu endif
